arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: This forms a portion of collection #5488 B. The guide to the entire collection is available here.

Series CVI is arranged in 9 sub-series by Union file number.
Series CVII is arranged in 10 sub-series by Union file number.
Series CVIII is arranged in 1 sub-series by Union file number.
Series CIX is arranged in 1 sub-series by Union file number.
